title: someone hacked my email and account
body: someone hacked my email and account my password for this account has been changed i was lucky enough that i was still logged into my boards account could i please get some help with this

replies.body: Eeeeee that's no good! Hit up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can to make sure your account hasn't been tampered with. They'll also be able to help you secure your account and reverse any possible damages.
thank you they got my account back for me
noticed my email was changed when i checked my boards account here and my password for my game is changed to sooo this kind of sucks
